item.ptxt: For vehicle without diesel particulate filter, DTCs with asterisk (*) in table below are not detected.
For DTCs with asterisk 2 (**) in table below, they will be added from the end of 2008 production.

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor signal frequency above a given threshold
Boost Pressure Control Solenoid Valve Control Circuit

item.ptxt: Boost pressure control solenoid valve circuit shorted to ground circuit
Boost pressure control solenoid valve circuit open or shorted to power circuit

entry.ptxt: Fuel flow actuator control signal low or high input
Mass or Volume Air Flow Circuit

item.ptxt: MAF sensor circuit shorted to ground circuit
MAF sensor circuit open or shorted to power circuit
Poor performance of MAF sensor

entry.ptxt: Barometric pressure is lower or higher than specification
IAT sensor 1 signal low or high input
ECT sensor signal low or high input

item.ptxt: Fuel pressure sensor signal low or high input
Poor performance of fuel pressure sensor

entry.ptxt: Fuel injector No.1 control signal circuit open or short
Fuel injector No.2 control signal circuit open or short
Fuel injector No.3 control signal circuit open or short
Fuel injector No.4 control signal circuit open or short

item.ptxt: Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (main) circuit shorted to ground circuit
Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (main) circuit open or shorted to power circuit
Poor performance of Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (main)

entry.ptxt: Boost pressure sensor signal low or high input
Vehicle speed is higher than 5 km/h (3.2 mile/h). While the after-sales regeneration is in progress.
Detection of engine speed fluctuation (problem on cylinder No.1)
Detection of engine speed fluctuation (problem on cylinder No.2)
Detection of engine speed fluctuation (problem on cylinder No.3)
Detection of engine speed fluctuation (problem on cylinder No.4)
Crankshaft position sensor signal not input or incorrect signal input
Camshaft position sensor signal not input or inconsistent signal input
Glow plug control signal low or high input

item.ptxt: EGR valve actuator circuit shorted to ground circuit
EGR valve actuator circuit open or shorted to power circuit
Excessive or insufficient EGR flow
Poor performance of EGR valve
Differential pressure sensor circuit shorted to ground circuit
Differential pressure sensor circuit open or shorted to power circuit
Poor performance of differential pressure sensor

entry.ptxt: Radiator fan relay No.1 control circuit low or high input
Radiator fan relay No.2 and No.3 control circuit low or high input
EGR stroke sensor signal low or high input

item.ptxt: Vehicle speed signal not input or incorrect signal input
Receiving error on CAN communication from other control module

entry.ptxt: A/C refrigerant pressure sensor signal circuit low or high input

item.ptxt: Exhaust gas temperature sensor 3 circuit shorted to ground circuit
Exhaust gas temperature sensor 3 circuit open or shorted to power circuit

entry.ptxt: Power supply low or high input
Brake pedal switch signal (Brake switch 2) is inconsistent with stop light switch signal (Brake switch 1).
Engine control module internal faulty (system error)

item.ptxt: Poor performance of ECM
IMA codes is not entered or erroneous

entry.ptxt: Power supply from ignition switch low or high input
Fuel pump relay control circuit low or high input

item.ptxt: Inlet throttle valve actuator circuit shorted to ground circuit
Inlet throttle valve actuator circuit open or shorted to power circuit
Inlet throttle valve position signal low or high input

entry.ptxt: Sensor power source voltage is too high or too low from ECM (Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (main), boost pressure sensor, differential pressure sensor)
A/C compressor relay control circuit low or high input
Sensor power source voltage is too high or too low from ECM (Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (sub), EGR stroke sensor)
Detection an error of pre-heating control or glow plug failure
Monitor signal of main relay is different from command signal.
Sensor power source voltage is too high or too low from ECM (Fuel pressure sensor, MAF)
Weight of soot in diesel particulate filter is more than 52 g.
Forced regeneration with speed request is failed 10 times.

item.ptxt: Fault appears any one of the following conditions.
The weight of soot contained in the filter is greater than 42 g.
The regeneration is failed 7 times.
The weight of soot contained in the filter is greater than 25 g and the regeneration is failed 6 times.

entry.ptxt: Upstream Side Differential Pressure Sensor Failure*
Clog diesel particulate filter upstream side pipe of differential pressure sensor
Airbag Deployment signal is detected via CAN.
Additional Heater Relay No.1 Control Circuit
Additional heater relay No.1 control circuit low or high input
Additional Heater Relay No.2, 3 Control Circuit
Additional heater relay No.2 and 3 control circuit low or high input
This DTC is always detected when ambient temperature is lower than 10 °C (50 °F).
Diesel Particulate Filter Efficiency Below Threshold*

item.ptxt: Differential pressure sensor signal out of specification
Exhaust gas temperature sensor 2 circuit shorted to ground circuit
Exhaust gas temperature sensor 2 circuit open or shorted to power circuit
Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (sub) circuit shorted to ground circuit
Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (sub) circuit open or shorted to power circuit
Poor performance of Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (sub)

entry.ptxt: EGR valve out of tolerance or inoperative
EGR valve out of tolerance or inoperative
Fuel Filter Water Detection Sensor Circuit

item.ptxt: Fuel filter water detection sensor circuit open or short
Fuel filter water detection sensor detects water in fuel filter
Excessive EGR flow
Poor performance of EGR valve
Exhaust gas temperature sensor 1 circuit shorted to ground circuit
Exhaust gas temperature sensor 1 circuit open or shorted to power circuit

entry.ptxt: Exhaust Gas Temperature Sensor 1 Regulation Failure
Exhaust gas temperature sensor 1 signal too high input
Turbocharger Electric Water Pump Control Circuit
Turbocharger electric water pump relay control circuit low or high input
Exhaust Gas Temperature Sensor 2 Threshold Overshoot Failures During After-sales Regeneration*
The exhaust gas temperature sensor 2 detects over 700 °C, 1292 °F while the after-sales regeneration was in progress.
